scripts.applens: npm run fixAngularReact && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng serve --host 0.0.0.0 applens
scripts.ncloud-applens-prod: npm run fixAngularReact && ng serve applens --configuration=nationalcloud-production
scripts.ncloud-applens-local: npm run fixAngularReact && ng serve applens --configuration=nationalcloud-local
scripts.ssl: npm run fixAngularReact && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng serve --host 0.0.0.0 app-service-diagnostics --ssl --ssl-cert ./ssl/server.crt --ssl-key ./ssl/server.key
scripts.ssl-local: npm run fixAngularReact && npm run ssl -- -c local
scripts.ssl-local-poll: npm run fixAngularReact && npm run ssl -- --poll 2000 -c local
scripts.build-lib: npm run fixAngularReact && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build diagnostic-data
scripts.build-applens: npm run fixAngularReact && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build applens --configuration production --sourceMap=true
scripts.build-ncloud-applens-prod: npm run fixAngularReact && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build applens --configuration=nationalcloud-production
scripts.build-ncloud-applens-local: npm run fixAngularReact && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build applens --configuration=nationalcloud-local
scripts.build-asd: npm run fixAngularReact && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build app-service-diagnostics --configuration production --deploy-url https://app-service-diagnostics-portal.azureedge.net/ --sourceMap=true
scripts.build-asd-no-cdn: npm run fixAngularReact && node --max_old_space_size=8192 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build app-service-diagnostics --configuration production --sourceMap=true
scripts.build: npm run fixAngularReact && npm run build-lib && npm run build-applens && npm run build-asd && npm run build-ng-flowchart
scripts.lib: npm run fixAngularReact && ng build diagnostic-data --watch
